definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]

sentences.english: I've been as busy as a bee all day doing my spring - cleaning.
sentences.chinese: 大掃除使得我一整天一直忙得不可開交。

sentences.english: I would have laughed in different circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 換了是別的場合，她這麼說我會笑得不可開交。

sentences.english: Between the planning of the wedding and SOUTHLAND, I'm pretty busy.
sentences.chinese: 在婚禮跟《南國》之間，我有點忙得不可開交了。

sentences.english: Just when I was busiest, he must come worrying.
sentences.chinese: 我正忙得不可開交，他偏要帶麻煩的事。

sentences.english: Beihai pavilion every day, from early in the morning is always so busy.
sentences.chinese: 北海亭每逢這一天，總是從一大早就忙得不可開交。

sentences.english: Domestic robots keep busy at the Korea Institute of Science and Technology.
sentences.chinese: 在韓國科技研究中心，家用機器人忙得不可開交。

sentences.english: This week meanwhile, both parties have been pre-occupied with picking their leaders.
sentences.chinese: 同時，本週兩黨都爲安排各自領導人忙的不可開交。

sentences.english: We cannot accept new orders since we have already got our hands full.
sentences.chinese: 我們不能再接受新訂單，因爲已經忙得不可開交了。

sentences.english: The last week of September 2009 was very busy for Oxfam.
sentences.chinese: 2009年9月最後一個星期，樂施會忙得不可開交。

sentences.english: With the new baby , my daughter really has her hands full.
sentences.chinese: 我女兒新添嬰兒後，忙得不可開交。

sentences.english: She came bustling out, wiping her hands on her apron.
sentences.chinese: 她忙的不可開交，把手放在圍裙上擦了又擦。

sentences.english: I don't want to see our two neighbours engaged in a brawl.
sentences.chinese: 我不希望我們兩家吵架吵得不可開交。

sentences.english: Pumping that water up to her neck.
We used to fight like cats and dogs .
sentences.chinese: 我們過去常打得不可開交。

sentences.english: Tomorrow will be their wedding day. Both their families are busy today preparing for the wedding ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 他們兩個明天就要拜天地了，家裏人忙得不可開交。

sentences.english: The planners were busy bypassing the Gordian knot.
sentences.chinese: 計劃者爲迴避這個棘手的問題，忙得不可開交。
